endpoints.description: Fetches the progress data of ongoing excavation operations.
Submits output data for a specific excavation site.
Retrieves reports on compliance with mining regulatory standards.
Updates details related to a specific excavation operation.
Removes an excavation operation record from the system.
Provides data regarding mineral distribution within the surveyed area.
Allows operators to log safety incidents at excavation sites.
Adjusts calibration settings for deployed sensors.
Returns current statuses of the excavation fleet.
Uploads or updates training materials for operators to ensure best practices adherence.
